scripts.start-dev: for file in src/baseFiles/*.js; do echo "build ${file}"; watchify ${file} -o dst/content/gen/$(basename "${file}") & done
scripts.stop-dev: ps | grep -v "grep" | grep "node" | grep "watchify src/baseFiles/" | cut -d' ' -f1 | xargs -n1 kill
scripts.build: for file in src/baseFiles/*.js; do echo "build ${file}"; browserify ${file} -o dst/content/gen/$(basename "${file}"); done
